description: Detects suspicious command line arguments of common data compression tools Author: Florian Roth, Samir Bousseaden. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Suspicious Compression Tool Parameters
query: ((winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:(7z*.exe OR *rar.exe OR *Command*Line*RAR*) AND process.command_line:(*\ \-p* OR *\ \-ta* OR *\ \-tb* OR *\ \-sdel* OR *\ \-dw* OR *\ \-hp*)) AND (NOT (process.parent.executable:C\:\\Program*)))
